meanings.definition: A person who rides on a wave while standing or lying on a surfboard.
meanings.sent1: The surfers glided gracefully on the waves.
meanings.sent2: Many surfers gathered at the beach to catch the perfect wave.
meanings.sent3: The surfers laughed as they rode the waves, feeling like kings of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The surfers were like dancers on the water, moving in harmony with the waves.
meanings.sent5: The image of the surfers riding the waves stayed etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of people who engage in the sport of surfing.
meanings.sent1: The surfers cheered each other on as they tackled the waves together.
meanings.sent2: The surfers formed a tight-knit community bonded by their love for surfing.
meanings.sent3: The surfers organized a beach clean-up event to give back to the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The surfers moved in unison, like a well-oiled machine, conquering the waves.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the surfers catching waves in sync was truly mesmerizing.
